oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Treatment of Sole Abscesses of Cattle in Missouri
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McPhail, Ross K.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sole abscesses of cattle
treatment
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A few years ago when sea sponges were more plentiful, they were recommended for bandaging legs on horses. I adapted a variation for the use of a sponge on a cow's sole abscess and puncture wound. Later, when Technovit acrylic became available, I started blocking the foot also.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1984; 173
